list_translation_mean.translate_mean: đắp thạch cao lên vết thương

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a soft mixture of lime with sand or cement and water for spreading on walls, ceilings, or other structures to form a smooth hard surface when dried.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: strip away the plaster to expose the bare brick
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tước bỏ thạch cao để lộ gạch trần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover (a wall, ceiling, or other structure) with plaster.
